U

up - Static variable in class net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.R.id
 
update(String) - Static method in class net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.querybuilder.QueryBuilder
Kicks off construction of an UPDATE query.
UPDATE_ALL - Static variable in class net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.SQLitePortal
Magic value to be passed to SQLiteDatabase.update(java.lang.String, android.content.ContentValues, java.lang.String, java.lang.String[]) and related methods when we want to indiscriminately update all rows, and get a count of the number of rows that were updated.
UPDATE_FAILED - Static variable in class net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.querybuilder.UpdateBuilder
Similar to the standard magic number returned when an insertion query fails (see SQLitePortal.INSERT_FAILED, this return value from UpdateBuilder.executeOn(SQLiteDatabase) indicates that the update operation could not be carried out.
updateAll() - Method in class net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.querybuilder.UpdateBuilder
Convenience grammar specifying that all rows should be deleted.
UpdateBuilder - Class in net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.querybuilder
Builds a SQLite UPDATE query.
UpdateBuilder(String) - Constructor for class net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.querybuilder.UpdateBuilder
 
useIntegerDefaultValue(int) - Method in class net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.content.PreferencePortal
Specifies the value that should be used as the integer default.
useLogo - Static variable in class net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.R.id
